name: places/ChIJ8b31x2i4XqgRABPDYDXzMKU
formattedAddress: 320 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Eric, Your Royal Wedding Officiant, was the best thing that happened to my wedding (besides the groom).

I was never one of those little girls who dreamed of a big, elaborate, traditional wedding. I really hadn't given much thought to it at all, other than knowing I wanted something memorable- and it was perfection. We couldn't have done it without Eric. We met up on a Zoom chat and immediately I knew we had chosen the right officiant. He just GOT us. I am so thankful we had him. Not only did he walk us through all of the marriage license legal stuff we would need, but he also was happy to give suggestions for *anything* we needed, guiding us towards wardrobe choices, locations, and an awesome photographer. He also had a safety pin on him to fix the strap of my dress that had come loose (after the wedding and pictures, luckily). We stan a prepared Prince! And the ceremony itself was lovely, both lighthearted and deeply personal. A few days before the ceremony (aka at the last minute) I mentioned a memorable dating milestone involving a wheel of cheddar, and Eric managed to work it in! He was very conscious of making the wedding about us, and like my relationship with my husband, it was better than I had hoped it could be.

I cannot recommend Eric, Your Royal Wedding Officiant, highly enough.

originalText.text: Eric made our day so special and a breeze to coordinate. He brought such a bright energy to our ceremony and even matched our wedding outfits. We feel so lucky to have had him make our union official!

text.text: Eric made our day so special and a breeze to coordinate. He brought such a bright energy to our ceremony and even matched our wedding outfits. We feel so lucky to have had him make our union official!

originalText.text: Our Your Royal Wedding Officiant experience was amazing from start to finish. Despite flight cancelations and rescheduling issues, Eric Strauss remained the consummate professional. He looked after us through it all. Our wedding day in Central Park was one of the happiest of our lives. We recommend Your Royal Wedding Officiant with the utmost confidence!

text.text: Our Your Royal Wedding Officiant experience was amazing from start to finish. Despite flight cancelations and rescheduling issues, Eric Strauss remained the consummate professional. He looked after us through it all. Our wedding day in Central Park was one of the happiest of our lives. We recommend Your Royal Wedding Officiant with the utmost confidence!

originalText.text: There aren't enough stars in the sky for the magical experience Eric orchestrated for us! His frequent and clear communication set our minds at ease as we traveled from out of state for our dream NYC wedding. He listened to our love story and personalized every detail of our big day. He dedicated time to scouting out a location in Central Park, coordinated the services of a fantastic photographer, and far exceeded our expectations of a wedding officiant in every way. As we share our wedding memories with friends and family, I have to credit our fabulous wedding officiant and friend, Eric. I highly recommend his royal services to anyone who wants a lifetime of beautiful wedding day memories.

originalText.text: Eric truly made our wedding feel like a royal wedding! I felt like a fairytale princess! I would look no further for an officiant on your wedding day,  he was absolutely a delight!
